CodeBlockMethod.Name: remove
CodeBlockMethod.Code: for id = #Coll_list, 1, -1 do if(Coll_list[id] == n) then table.remove(Coll_list,id) end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common == nil) then return end if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_neutral == true and TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_monster) then return end if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left) then --부딫친게 적이거나 아군 몬스터중 앞에 있는 애면 밑의 코드 실행 table.insert(self.Enemy_List,TriggerBodyEntity.Name) self.is_coll = true self.Entity.MovementComponent:Stop() elseif(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_monster and (TriggerBodyEntity.TransformComponent.Position.x < self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.x))then table.insert(self.Team_List,TriggerBodyEntity.Name) self.is_coll = true self.Entity.MovementComponent:Stop() elseif(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_neutral == true and TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_build) then table.insert(self.Enemy_List,TriggerBodyEntity.Name) self.is_coll = true self.Entity.MovementComponent:Stop() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerLeaveEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common == nil) then return end if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_neutral == true and TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_monster) then return end if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left ) then self:remove(self.Enemy_List,TriggerBodyEntity.Name) elseif (TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_monster and (TriggerBodyEntity.TransformComponent.Position.x < self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.x)) then self:remove(self.Team_List,TriggerBodyEntity.Name) elseif(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_neutral == true and TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_build) then self:remove(self.Enemy_List,TriggerBodyEntity.Name) end
if(#self.Enemy_List == 0 ) then if(#self.Team_List == 0)then self.is_coll = false end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleEntityDestroyEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- local c = Entity.Common if(c == nil) then return end if(c.is_neutral == true and c.is_monster) then return end if(Entity.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left) then self:remove(self.Enemy_List,Entity.Name)
elseif (Entity.Common.is_monster and (Entity.TransformComponent.Position.x < self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.x)) then self:remove(self.Team_List,Entity.Name) elseif(Entity.Common.is_neutral == true and Entity.Common.is_build) then self:remove(self.Enemy_List,Entity.Name) end if(#self.Enemy_List == 0 ) then if(#self.Team_List == 0)then self.is_coll = false end end
